title: Riot needs to lift 20 min que ban
body: Get rid of this ridiculous 20 min ban from que until the patching, know patching, issues are resolved please.

replies.body: There are currently no issues with the patching servers.  If you are having trouble playing matches without interruptions, I'd be happy to help!  Just let me know the issue you're experiencing with some more details about what's happening and when.  Playing without interruption will be the only way for your standing with [Leaverbuster](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ)  to improve.  Thanks!
